page.title: 05THE CHURCH PEOPLE AND PARTS
page.content:
The first rector of St.Peters was called{Nicholas}and he became rector in{1285.}The present rector of St.Peters church is called Reginald George Brombay.He has been there since 1981.He makes the{48th}rector in St.Peters church.The Leigh family provided the rectors of St.Peters church in the early 19th. century. Rev.F.T.Gardner followed in 1893 and remained until he died in 1936. He continued the work of repair and embellishment of the church.
Around the graveyard is a wall which has an unusual gateway in it.It was designed to keep animals out and let people through.It has one curved wooden piece on either side and a step in he middle.It is too narrow for animals to pass through although people can pass through sideways.
